casebody.data:
Walker, Appellee, v. Cincinnati Electronics Corporation, Appellant.

[Cite as Walker v. Cincinnati Electronics Corp. (1989), 43 Ohio St. 3d 156.]

(No. 88-565 Submitted April 5, 1989 Decided June 14, 1989.) Paul E. Perry, for appellee. Dinsmore & Shohl, Rebecca Planner White, George B. Wilkinson and Charles H. Broum III, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Hunter v. Shenango Furnace Co. (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 235, 527 N.E. 2d 871.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Shaw, JJ., concur. Stephen R. Shaw, J., of the Third Appellate District, sitting for Res-NICK, J.
